So I've been searching around a lot about gamepads and what different schematics people are using for them...but Ive only been able to find one or two. Does anyone have a solid suggestion for a PS3 controller map for the newbie starting out? I feel like using that would already make the game 10fold more accessible (I'm playing on a laptop, mind you, and at the moment don't even have a real mouse connected- something I'll definitely fix tomorrow until I get a good PS3 controller layout.)

Thanks!
Since you received no answers in the welcome thread, I've moved this to gameplay, where it might be more likely to elicit a helpful response.
